name: Cube Escape [VR]
description:
Features:

  • Permanent lasers stuck to your hands
  • A rhythmic twister-like experience
  • Three levels of increasingly difficulty
  • Variety of audio-visual themes across levels

The game was developed for the Oculus Quest, here's a guide for putting the .apk on your device. Other Oculus headsets should work fine using the windows version, however you will need to be able to perform 360 motion, so keep that in mind if using a cable.

Game doesn't have any menus to quit, Alt+F4 is your friend.
